survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Gardening Supply Stores
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and gather feedback on the shopping experience with online gardening supply stores to improve service quality and product offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop at online gardening supply stores?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you shop at online gardening supply stores?

questions.question_text: What types of gardening products do you typically purchase online? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What types of gardening products do you typically purchase online? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall shopping experience at online gardening supply stores?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall shopping experience at online gardening supply stores?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the online shopping experience could be improved? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What aspects of the online shopping experience could be improved? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the online gardening supply shopping experience.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow respondents to provide detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the online gardening supply shopping experience.
